dcterms:creator: A. G. Mohammadi
A. F. Dizaji
dcterms:description: The Nava dataset includes 1786 records and up to 55 hours of music played solo by 40 various artists with five known Iranian instruments (Kamanche, Tar, Setar, Reed, and Dulcimer). Each music piece belongs only to one of the Dastgahs, making it a comprehensive dataset for Dastgah classification and instrument recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Nava dataset
